name: The Shattered Gate
description:
A game made for:
- Mouse Jam [8 Bits to Infinity]: Limitation Mouse only
- Weekly Game Jam - Week 210: Theme Fragments

Warning: There's a known bug where the last shard can't found, a  patch will be released as soon as the jam voting ends.

To play the game click anywhere on the screen to move around, a single finger on a touch screen also works.

Walk over the sparkles to gather the crystal fragments, once a full crystal is formed take it to the gate.
